ownedAnnexSubclause.name: hybrid
ownedAnnexSubclause.sourceText:
{**
variables ts : CTCS_Types::Position -- train position tv : CTCS_Types::Velocity -- train velocity ta : CTCS_Types::Acceleration --train acceleration t : CTCS_Types::Time -- train clock time constants b = 1 mpss --maximum deceleration of the train, assumed as 1 mpss behavior Train ::= 'DT 1 ts = tv' & 'DT 1 tv = ta' & 'DT 1 t = 1' [[> ts!(ts), tv!(tv),ta?(ta) ]]> Continue Continue ::= skip RunningTrain ::= ts:= 0 & tv:=0 & ta:=0 & REPEAT(Train) **}

ownedComment.body: --maximum deceleration of the train, assumed as 1 mpss
--maximum deceleration of the train, assumed as 1 mpss
--maximum deceleration of the train, assumed as 1 mpss

ownedAnnexSubclause.name: Uncertainty
ownedAnnexSubclause.sourceText:
{** variables time dealy_variation applied to ta -- modeling connection delay price acc_variation applied to ta -- modeling rail friction function dealy_variation = Normal(2.2,0.6) acc_variation = Normal(0.5,0.4) property p1 = Train.tv<=0 && Train.ts<EOA && Controller.STOP p2 = Train.ts >= 50 under <=100
**}

parsedAnnexSubclause.name: Uncertainty
parsedAnnexSubclause.sourceText: variables time v_delay applied to Train.ts -- modeling connection delay static price v_fr applied to Train.ta -- modeling rail friction distributions v_delay = Normal(2.2,0.6) v_fr = Normal(-0.5,0.4) queries p1 = Train.tv<=0 && Train.ts<EOA && Controller.STOP p2 = Train.ts >= 50 under <=100

ownedAnnexSubclause.name: BLESS

ownedComment.body: --<<SRL:x: exists t:CTCS_Types::Time in x-sr .. x that (s@t and v@t)>> --sampling rate limit
--<<SRL:x: exists t:CTCS_Types::Time in x-sr .. x that (s@t and v@t)>> --sampling rate limit

ownedAnnexSubclause.name: Uncertainty
ownedAnnexSubclause.sourceText:
{** variables time dealy_variation applied to ta -- modeling connection delay price acc_variation applied to ta -- modeling rail friction function dealy_variation = Normal(2.2,0.6) acc_variation = Normal(0.5,0.4) property p1 = Train.tv<=0 && Train.ts<EOA && Controller.STOP p2 = Train.ts >= 50 under <=100
**}

parsedAnnexSubclause.name: Uncertainty
parsedAnnexSubclause.sourceText: variables time r_delay applied to RBC.r -- modeling connection delay distributions r_delay = Normal(2.2,0.6) queries p1 = Pr[<=300](<> v<=0 && s<6000 && s>0)
